sqls: --门诊挂号表 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from EN_OUTPATIENT_REGIST a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.REGIST_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --门诊就诊记录表 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from EN_OUTPATIENT_VISIT a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.VISIT_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --门诊诊疗处方 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from EN_OUTPATIENT_PRESC a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.PRESCRIPTION_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --门诊发药表 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from EN_OUTPATIENT_MEDI_SCHED a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.DISPENSING_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --退药表 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from EN_WITHDRAWAL a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.DRUG_REPER_REQUEST_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --诊断表 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from EN_DIAGNOSIS a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.DIAGNOSIS_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --处方与诊断表 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from EN_PRESC_DIAGNOSIS a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.DIAGNOSIS_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --入院登记信息 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from EN_INPATIENT_REGIST_INFO a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.INHOSPITAL_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --住院就诊记录表 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from EN_INPATIENT_VISIT a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.INHOSPITAL_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --住院医嘱明细表 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from EN_INPATIENT_ORDER_DETAIL a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.ORDER_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --住院发药记录 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from EN_INPATIENT_MEDI_SCHED a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.DISPENSING_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --住院发药明细表 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from EN_INPATIENT_MEDI_SCHED_DETAIL a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.DISPENSING_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --门诊收费汇总表 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from EN_OUTPATIENT_FEE_SUMM a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.CHARGE_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --门诊收费明细表 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from EN_OUTPATIENT_FEE_DETAIL a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.CHARGE_RETURN_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --住院收费汇总表（已结算） select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from EN_INPATIENT_FEE_SUMM a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.CHARGE_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --住院收费明细表（已结算） select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from EN_INPATIENT_FEE_DETAIL a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.CHARGE_RETURN_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --检验记录表 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from EN_LAB_INFO a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.APPLY_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --细菌结果表 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from EN_BACTERIAL_RESULT a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.REPORT_DATE >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --过敏信息表 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from EN_ALLERGY_INFO a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.RECORD_DATE_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --药敏结果表 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from EN_DRUG_SENSIT_RESULTS a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.REPORT_DATE >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --检验结果指标表 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from EN_LAB_RESULT a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.REPORT_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --检查预约表 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from EN_EXAM_APPO_INFO a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.APPOINTEXAM_DATE >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --检查记录表 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from EN_EXAM_RECORD_INFO a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.RIS_CHECK_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --手术申请单 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from EN_OPERATION_REQUEST a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.APPLY_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --手术安排 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from EN_OPERATION_RANG a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.OPER_DATE >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --麻醉安排 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from EN_ANESTHESIA_RANG a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.OPER_DATE >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --手术用药 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from EN_OPERATION_MEDICAL a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.MEDICAL_BEGIN_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --输血申请 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from EN_BLOOD_TRANS_REQUEST a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.APPLY_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --配血记录 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from EN_BLOOD_MATCH_RECORD a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.PREPARE_BLOOD_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --输血记录表 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from EN_BLOOD_RECORD_INFO a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.APPLY_DATETIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --病历文书汇总 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MR_MEDICAL_RECORD_SUMM a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.DOCUMENT_TATLE_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --西医住院病案首页 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MR_WEST_INPATIENT_HOMEPAGE a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.DISCHARGE_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --中医住院病案首页 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MR_CH_INPATIENT_HOMEPAGE a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.DISCHARGE_DATE_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --门（急）诊病历 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MR_INPATIENT_MEDICAL_RECORD a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.RECORD_DATE_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --急诊留观病历 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MR_EMERG_STAY_MED_RECORD a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.RECORD_DATE_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --卫生事件摘要 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MR_HEALTH_EVENTS_SUMM a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.VISIT_DATETIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --基本健康信息 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MR_BASE_HEALTH_INFO a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.RECORD_DATE_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --入院记录 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MR_INPATIETN_INFO a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.RECORD_DATE_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --24小时入出院死亡记录 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MR_24H_INPATIENT_INFO a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.RECORD_DATE_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --首次病程记录 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MR_FIRST_COURSE_RECO a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.RECORD_DATE_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --日常病程记录 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MR_DAILY_COURSE_RECO a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.RECORD_DATE_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --上级医师查房记录 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MR_SUP_PHYS_WA_ROU_RECO a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.RECORD_DATE_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --疑难病例讨论 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MR_DIFFICULT_CASE_DISCUSS a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.RECORD_DATE_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --交接班记录 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MR_SHIFT_HANDOVER_RECO a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.RECORD_DATE_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --转科记录 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MR_TRANSFER_RECO a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.RECORD_DATE_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --阶段小结 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MR_STAGES_SUMMARY a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.RECORD_DATE_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --会诊记录 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MR_CONSULTATION_RECO a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.RECORD_DATE_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --术前小结 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MR_PREOPERATIVE_SUMMARY a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.RECORD_DATE_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --术前讨论 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MR_PREOPERATIVE_DISCUSS a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.RECORD_DATE_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --手术记录 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MR_OPERATIVE_RECORD a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.RECORD_DATE_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --术后首次病程记录 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MR_FIRST_POS_COURSE_RECO a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.RECORD_DATE_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --出院记录 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MR_DISCHARGE_RECO a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.RECORD_DATE_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --死亡记录 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MR_DEATH_RECORD a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.RECORD_DATE_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --死亡病例讨论记录 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MR_DEATH_CASE_DISC_RECO a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.RECORD_DATE_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --手术同意 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MR_OPERATION_CONSENT a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.RECORD_DATE_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --麻醉知情通知 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MR_ANESTHESIA_INFO_NOTICE a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.RECORD_DATE_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --输血治疗同意书 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MR_BLOOD_TRAN_TRE_CONS a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.RECORD_DATE_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --特殊检查及特殊治疗同意书 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MR_SP_EXA_SPE_TRE_CONS a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.RECORD_DATE_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --病危（重通知书） select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MR_CRITICAL_ILLNESS_NOTICE a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.RECORD_DATE_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --其他知情同意书 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MR_OTHER_INFORMED_CONS a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.RECORD_DATE_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --待产记录 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MR_WAIT_CHILDBIRTH_RECO a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.RECORD_DATE_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --阴道分娩记录 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MR_VAGINAL_DELIVERY_RECO a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.RECORD_DATE_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --剖宫产手术记录 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MR_CESAREAN_SECTION_RECO a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.RECORD_DATE_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --治疗处置记录表 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MR_TREATMENT_RECORD a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.RECORD_DATE_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --麻醉术前访视记录 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MR_ANES_PREOP_VISIT_RECO a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.RECORD_DATE_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --麻醉记录 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MR_ANESTHESIA_RECORD a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.SIGN_DATETIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --麻醉术后访视记录 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MR_POST_ANES_VISIT_RECO a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.RECORD_DATE_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --抢救记录表 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MR_RESCUE_RECORD a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.RECORD_DATE_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --上报卡 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MR_REPORT_CARD a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.REPORT_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --感染上报 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MR_INFECTION_REPORT a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.REPORT_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --一般护理记录 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MP_GENERAL_CARE_RECO a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.SIGN_DATETIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --手术护理功能 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MP_OPER_NURSE_FUNC a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.SIGN_DATETIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --生命体征测量记录 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MP_VITAL_SIGN_MEAS_RECO a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.SIGN_DATETIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --出入量记录 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MP_IN_OUT_MEASURE_RECO a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.RECORD_DATE_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --高值耗材使用记录 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MP_HIGH_VAL_CON_USE_RECO a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.USE_DATE_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --耗材入库表 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from BD_CON_WAREHOUSE a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.DBILL_DATE >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --耗材出库表 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from BD_CON_WAREHOUS_OUT a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.DBILL_DATE >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --病危（重）护理记录 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MP_CRITICAL_CARE_RECORD a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.SIGN_DATETIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --特级护理记录 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MP_SUPER_CARE_RECORD a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.SIGN_DATETIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --入院评估记录 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MP_ADMISSION_ASSE_RECO a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.SIGN_DATETIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --护理计划记录 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MP_NURSE_PLAN_RECO a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.SIGN_DATETIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --出院评估与指导记录 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MP_DISC_ASSE_GUID_RECO a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.SIGN_DATETIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --临床路径 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MP_ACCESS_CLINICAL_PATH a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.CP_IN_DATE >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --变异原因记录表 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MP_NOT_INC_WIT_VAR_REA_RECO a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.CONFIRM_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --临床路径诊断 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from MP_CLINICAL_PATH_DIAGNOSIS a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.DIAGNOSIS_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --就诊记录表（体检） select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from PH_VISIT_RECORD_TJ a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.TEST_DATE_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --体检总检表 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from PH_GENERAL_PHYSICAL_EXAM a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.ALL_CHECK_DATE >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --体格及功能检查报告表 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from PH_PHYSICAL_FUNC_EXAM a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.REPORT_DATE >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B --体格及功能检查明细表 select top 5 a.id, a.ORG_PATIENT_SN, b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B from PH_PHYSICAL_FUNC_EXAM_LIST a left join PI_PATIENT_INFO b on a.ORG_PATIENT_SN=b.ORG_PATIENT_SN ORG_PATIENT_SN_B where a.EXAM_TIME >='2017-01-01' order by ORG_PATIENT_SN _B
